entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: W 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Drizzle along the lakeshore this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 8:08 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Overcast. High zero.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 8:08 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 8:08 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
